title: Community
description: This is a representation of a community.

id.description: The unique immutable ID for this community.  A new ID will be generated for new Communities.  Once issued, this ID is guaranteed to never change or be re-issued

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an community is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an community is out-of-date.

createdOn.description: The date this community was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

modifiedOn.description: The date this community was last modified.
modifiedOn.title: Modified On

createdBy.description: The ID of the user that created this community.
createdBy.title: Created By

modifiedBy.description: The ID of the user that last modified this community.
modifiedBy.title: Modified By
